questions.question: What is included in the package?
questions.answer: Our packages include flights, accommodation, transportation, visa processing, and spiritual guidance throughout your journey.

questions.question: How do I secure my booking?
questions.answer: A deposit of 30% is required to secure your booking, with the remaining balance due 3 months before departure.

questions.question: Are there any age restrictions?
questions.answer: Pilgrims must be at least 12 years old. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a guardian.
